entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 3.
